name: docsService
description: Lambda for the NYPL Docs Service

scripts.deploy-dev: node-lambda deploy -e development -P nypl-sandbox -o arn:aws:iam::224280085904:role/lambda_basic_execution -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json -b subnet-f4fe56af -g sg-1d544067
scripts.deploy-qa: node-lambda deploy -e qa -P nypl-digital-dev -o arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -f config/var_qa.env -S config/event_sources_qa.json
scripts.deploy-production: node-lambda deploy -e production -P nypl-digital-dev -o arn:aws:iam::946183545209:role/lambda-full-access -f config/var_production.env -S config/event_sources_production.json
